Package angryflappybird

Class AngryFlappyBird

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • angryflappybird.AngryFlappyBird
  • public class AngryFlappyBird
extends javafx.application.Application
    Launches the application, prepares the application scene and implements the animation of the objects on the scene.

      • resetGameControl

        private void resetGameControl()
        Resets the gameControl scene that holds the button. the getContent method sets the Scene layer

      • mouseClickHandler

        private void mouseClickHandler​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        Handles the effect of click on startButton.

      • resetGameScene

        private void resetGameScene​(boolean firstEntry)
        Resets the gameScene differently based on whether the game is entered anew or after a lost life. Resets all flags + game params, including visuals (blob, floor)
        Parameters:
        firstEntry - determines whether this is a new game

      • setEgg

        private void setEgg​(int height)
        Sets an egg to appear on a (next) set of pipes, with chance specified.
        Parameters:
        height - of (bottom) pipe for egg to appear on top of

      • setPig

        private void setPig()
        Sets a pig to appear (falling down from top of screen) with a (next) set of pipes, with chance specified.

      • getRandomPipeHeight

        private int getRandomPipeHeight()
        Generates a random height value for a bottom pipe, within range from DEF
        Returns:
        random height value for bottom pipe, in range [PIPE_MAX_HEIGHT,PIPE_MIN_HEIGHT)

      • setPipes

        private void setPipes()
        Generates a set of pipes (one top, one bottom) to next appear on screen

      • checkPipeScroll

        private void checkPipeScroll()
        Ensure old and new pipes scroll off and on the screen

        Parameters:
